radiographic_examinations.findings: Decreased echogenicity of the thyroid parenchyma and a volume of 16 ml (normal range, 4â€“H110063 ml). Ultrasound examination revealed a hypoplastic thyroid gland.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: In patient 3, a normal thyroid gland was observed in the ultrasound, whereas previously, no thyroid gland was visible in the I131 scintigraphy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No functional active thyroid tissue was observed.
